summary: Applied Apple Liquid Glass effect to AI Bot section and moved it lower. Changed chatbox position from lg:top-[119px] to lg:top-[200px] to prevent overlap with pink form section. Added SVG filter for liquid glass distortion effect. Restructured HTML with 4 layers (glass-filter, glass-overlay, glass-specular, glass-content) following Apple Liquid Glass technique. Added CSS styles for all glass layers in app.css. SVG filter added to layout file.
current_status: AI Bot section now has Apple Liquid Glass effect with proper layering and is positioned lower to avoid overlap with pink form. Ready for browser testing to verify the glassmorphism effect works correctly.
